description.narrative: The project will develop the water resources and promote improved management practices to increase and protect incomes and livelihoods of people in the poorest provinces of the central region. The components are: (i) irrigation and development; (ii) institutional support for system management and agricultural extension.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased agricultural production in the selected irrigation subprojects.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
- maintenance performed on 95% of commanded area;

description.narrative: Increased agricultural production in the selected irrigation subprojects.

title.narrative: - collection of water user fees increased to 95% of target;

description.narrative: Increased agricultural production in the selected irrigation subprojects.

title.narrative: - subsidies to irrigation management companies (IMCs) reduced by at least 20% from current levels

description.narrative: Increased agricultural production in the selected irrigation subprojects.

title.narrative: Improved performance of irrigated agriculture in the selected subprojects: - area commanded and served in aequate and timely manner increased to 95% of potential;

description.narrative: Increased agricultural production in the selected irrigation subprojects.
